Room.Name: Caledonia Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Caledonia Road, just south of the annual Brownhaven Fair. On the north side of the road there are a lot of tents and booths set up to form an open-air market place. Near the entrance, you can see a group of acrobats practicing their moves. On the south side of the road is an old building with a faded sign. "Jeremia's maps and information."
